divs: Sighting Detailsi was talking to my nieghbor and looking at the moon and jupiter and mars talking about how they were alined when a starlike object appeared on the oppisite side of the moon it swelled in intensity larger than jupiter then faded as it flew south. it was so bright that i doubt it was the rotating reflection of a satilight. isaw the same thing again an hour later at 6:06 p.m. flying north.
Summary: Bright star increasing in intensity then faded away as it flew south.
trends: There have been 23 other sightings in Sparks
